availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Josephus G. Hazelwood (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, attorney.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, attorney. Rockcastle County, Kentucky, native. Attended school in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attended Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky. Attorney in Rockcastle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Northern District, p. 184A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 580.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Cass County, Everett Township, p. 567B.
"Candidates for Congress," The Galveston Daily News (Galveston, TX), May 13, 1896, p. 6.
"Judge Josephus Gates Hazlewood (1836-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial 26046340, accessed September 25, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26046340.
